items.sentence: How many years ago did you start working here?
I'm glad that nobody got hurt in the accident.
I don't have enough money to buy anything now.
We ought to do something about this situation.
Which one do you prefer, this one or that one?
I didn't really feel like eating Chinese food.
Tom wasn't really sick, but he called in sick.
Tom said that he was too sick to come to work.
Tom will be on the same train that I'll be on.
Tom said he was looking for a vending machine.
Tom is hoping that he can win the first prize.
I don't have the time to think about that now.
I'd rather do that tomorrow. Would that be OK?
I tried my best, but I wasn't able to do that.
Tom was never really interested in doing that.
Tom said that everyone he knows has done that.
I'm not surprised Tom doesn't want to do that.
I don't think that Tom would let Mary do that.
Perseverance and patience are always rewarded.
I wish I didn't have to go to Boston tomorrow.
I'd really hoped I'd be able to see Tom dance.
I think that it might be difficult to do that.
I haven't yet read the article that Tom wrote.
Tom often write articles for travel magazines.
I'm definitely not going to be there tomorrow.
I've begun to have doubts that'll ever happen.
I didn't mean to imply what you did was wrong.
Tom didn't realize that Mary had to help John.
Greece was the cradle of western civilization.
Tom didn't get the promotion he was expecting.
Do you have a highlighter that I could borrow?
Is Tom planning on getting a job anytime soon?
What do high school girls talk about nowadays?
What was the stupidest thing you did as a kid?
We expect a lot of people to be here tomorrow.
The map that Tom drew for me wasn't very good.
I thought that I told you not to do that here.
Tom said he had a wonderful time in Australia.
When was the last time that you went shopping?
Did you really think that I wouldn't help you?
Tom says that Mary isn't permitted to do that.
You'll soon get used to the change of climate.
You'll ruin your health if you drink too much.
You won't find much news in today's newspaper.
You shouldn't talk when the teacher's talking.
You may change your mind in a couple of weeks.
You didn't have to come into the office today.
You'd better wear a sweater under your jacket.
You have to endure a lot of hardships in life.
You must come every six months for a check-up.
